attributes.action: Cancel all student debt incurred during 2019/20 & 2020/21 academic years.
attributes.additional_details: Students are not getting full value for what they have paid for, many lessons are virtual with very few attending university but still incurring large debts. By cancelling student debt for these academic years these students will have greater disposable income to support the economic recovery when Covid is under control.
attributes.background: Due to the Covid pandemic university students are being unfairly treated. Still paying full tuitions fees along with the costs of accomodation I call on the government to cancel all fees incurred by university students during the 2019/20 & 2020/21 academic years.
